meanings.def: the activity of testing somebody/something in order to find something out, see if it works, etc.
examples: All our cosmetics are produced without animal testing.
Experts are questioning the value of home cholesterol testing kits.
More large-scale research and testing of smoke venting systems needs to be undertaken.
Police are now using a lot more DNA testing.

meanings.def: difficult to deal with and needing particular strength or abilities
examples: This has been a testing time for us all.
